changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Track the latest updates and improvements to {siteName}
changelog.majorUpdate: Major update: comprehensive recipe system improvements, data fixes, and enhanced user experience
changelog.patchRelease: Patch release: bug fixes and data corrections for cargo items and recipe trees
changelog.initialReleaseDesc: Initial release of the {siteName} web application
changelog.enhancedInfoPanelDesc: Added item descriptions, improved badge styling for tier/rarity/category, and better recipe requirement display with proper lookup tables from game data.
changelog.materialNodeRecipeSupportDesc: Material nodes now support recipe selection and display recipe requirements, matching the functionality of item nodes for complete recipe tree visibility.
changelog.improvedLayoutAlgorithmDesc: Switched from depth-first to breadth-first ranking for better recipe tree visualization with more compact node spacing.
changelog.enhancedSearchExperienceDesc: Combobox now uses virtualization for fast search in large lists. Results only appear after typing. Popover rendering issues fixed.
changelog.completeCargoItemSupportDesc: Fixed cargo items (like Rough Plant Roots) missing from the app. Updated mapping script to include all cargo items regardless of compendium_entry field.
changelog.recipeRequirementsDatabaseDesc: Built comprehensive lookup tables from game data for professions, tools, and buildings instead of using placeholder mappings. Now displays accurate requirements like "forestry", "axe", "tier-1-forestry-station".
changelog.recipeQuantityCalculationDesc: Fixed child recipe nodes showing incorrect quantities. Now properly calculates quantities by multiplying parent requirements throughout the entire recipe tree.
changelog.recipeOutputDisplayDesc: Fixed recipe output showing raw IDs instead of item names in the Usage section. Now displays proper names like "Produces: 1x Refined Rough Cloth".
changelog.recipeRequirementsVisibilityDesc: Fixed recipe requirements showing as empty strings for nodes beyond the 2nd level. Now all nodes in the recipe tree display proper profession, building, and tool requirements.
changelog.cargoItemsNowAppearDesc: Fixed cargo items missing from the app due to mapping script filtering. Now includes all cargo items regardless of compendium_entry field.
changelog.childRecipeQuantityCalculationDesc: Fixed child recipe nodes showing Qty: 1 instead of correct quantities based on parent requirements.
changelog.interactiveRecipeVisualizerDesc: Visual flow diagrams showing crafting dependencies and requirements for any item in the game.
changelog.quantityCalculatorDesc: Calculate exact material requirements for any desired output quantity with automatic recipe scaling.
changelog.comprehensiveItemDatabaseDesc: Search through all items, cargo, and resources with detailed information including tier, rarity, and category.
changelog.multiLanguageSupportDesc: Internationalization support for English, French, and Spanish with easy language switching.
changelog.modernResponsiveUIDesc: Beautiful, responsive interface built with shadcn/ui components and Tailwind CSS, optimized for both desktop and mobile.
changelog.realGameDataIntegrationDesc: Built using actual game data from BitCraft server files, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
changelog.performanceOptimizedDesc: Virtualized search, efficient data structures, and optimized rendering for smooth performance even with large datasets.
changelog.typescriptModernStackDesc: Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and modern React patterns for maintainability and type safety.
